var url = window.location.hostname;

    case 'devsolarmon.focustech.vn':

        serverData = 'https://apiserver.techedge.vn/uploads';
        break;
    default:
        serverAPI = 'http://localhost:3015';
        serverData = 'http://localhost:3015/uploads';

}
